events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position submitted via our careers portal this morning.
The application has been reviewed and categorized under the engineering department based on the candidate’s experience with software development and devops skills.
A recruiter specialized in engineering positions has been assigned to manage this candidate’s recruitment process.
Initial phone screening was conducted to assess the candidate's background and confirm relevant software engineer experience and skills.
The candidate responded promptly and expressed strong interest in proceeding further with technical interviews for the developer role.
A technical interview with the software engineering panel has been scheduled for the candidate next week to evaluate coding and system design skills.
